frameset.edef: to liken something to something else

example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS شبه) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *) (NP-OBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الوضع) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_ACC الحالي) (PP-CLR (PUNC ") (PREP ب) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN كارثة) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN خروج) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN قطار) (PP (PREP عن) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN سكت) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه) (PUNC ") (PUNC .)

arg.g: to a desaster caused by a derailed train
